name: The Dream of Rowan
overview: Game written in AMOS Pro. Coding by Johnny Acevedo. Graphics by Hernán Beroldo. Music by Fernando Oliveira & Simone Bernacchia. Sound-FX by Sebastian Abreu. Voice acting by Ariel Cima Herrera & Soledad Cima Herrera. Screenwriter by Yay Morales. In the magic land of Arkala, everything is tranquil. It is a place full of natural beauty, with majestic forests, diverse wildlife, and a full moon every night. It is a place so peaceful that you could hear a pin falling on the grass. A boy called Rowan, who lives with his little sister in a remote house in the mountains, must go out to the local village to buy needed provisions and food. But that night, something unexpected happened, shattering the peace in Arkala. Something abnormal, even for a place where magic reigns. An unknown mystical person has invaded your home... ...and your little sister is inside! A few hours later you arrive home to find the house in a mess, and in the middle of it your sister Dannan lies unmoving on the floor. There is a note next to her. You read it and your world changes...
